news.title: Can boosting interferons, the body's frontline virus fighters, beat COVID-19?
news.summary: Science's COVID-19 reporting is supported by the Pulitzer Center. On 30 April, Valerie McCarthy’s test result confirmed that her grinding fatigue and pummeling headaches were caused by the new coronavirus.

news.title: Can boosting interferons, the body's frontline virus fighters, beat COVID-19?
news.summary: Valerie McCarthy received an injection that contained either placebo or an interferon.

blogs.title: A mouse model for COVID-19
blogs.summary: Small animal models (mice, ferrets, hamsters) are essential for understanding how SARS-CoV-2 causes disease and for pre-clinical evaluation of vaccines and antiviral therapeutics. One promising model has been developed by modifying SARS-CoV-2 so that it bi

blogs.title: Choices for Measuring Luciferase-Tagged Reporter Pseudotyped Viral Particles in Coronavirus Research
blogs.summary: Coronavirus (CoV) researchers are working quickly to understand the entry of SARS-CoV-2 into cells. The Spike or S proteins on the surface of a CoV is trimer. The monomer is composed of an S1 and S2 domain.

author.name: Promega Connections
author.description: Thoughts, tech tips and news about science from Promega Corporation

blogs.title: TWiV 626: Ralph Baric and fancy ferrets
blogs.summary: Daniel Griffin provides a clinical update on COVID-19, then Ralph Baric joins TWiV to discuss SARS-CoV-2 transmission, vaccines, diagnostic tests, and a new animal model from his laboratory that does not use transgenic mice. Hosts: Vincent Racaniello, Dick

author.name: This Week in Virology with Vincent Racaniello
author.description: This Week in Virology is a netcast about viruses - the kind that make you sick. Professors Vincent Racaniello, Dickson Despommier, Rich Condit and science writer Alan Dove and guests deconstruct viruses, how they cause illness, and how you can prevent infections.

blogs.title: Coronavirus Drug and Treatment Tracker
blogs.summary: An updated list of potential treatments for Covid-19.

blogs.title: TWiV 661: SWAG with Ralph Baric
blogs.summary: Ralph Baric returns to TWiV to provide an update on the COVID-19 resurgence in the US, monoclonal antibodies, antiviral drugs, vaccines, immunity and reinfection, reopening schools, and what will happen this fall. Hosts: Vincent Racaniello,  Rich Condit, K
